snippet: After moving to New York from Nigeria about a decade ago, Uro Ama Orji worked long hours as a cabdriver with the goal of bringing his five children to the United States.
abstract: Uro Ama Orji, cab driver from Nigeria, is killed when passenger stabs him through eye with umbrella in Brownsville, Brooklyn; Orji's death comes just months after he realized his dream of bringing his five children to United States.
lead_paragraph: After moving to New York from Nigeria about a decade ago, Uro Ama Orji worked long hours as a cabdriver with the goal of bringing his five children to the United States.

headline.main: Before Cabby Was Killed, His Dream Came True
headline.print_headline: Before Cabby Was Killed, His Dream Came True
